name: TV Series NLP Analyzer
description: An NLP system that scrapes and analyzes over 10,000+ character dialogues using Scrapy and Spacy, with an interactive Gradio web UI featuring a character chatbot trained with Llama 3.1.

name: Chest Cancer Classification
description: An end-to-end deep learning solution using EfficientNet-B3 for automated chest cancer classification from CT scans, achieving 85% accuracy with a modern MLOps pipeline.

name: MeroGuru AI
description: MeroGuru AI is an intelligent, RAG-powered educational platform that leverages hybrid semantic search and GPT-3.5 to provide grade-specific, personalized tutoring for students in Nepal.

name: TradeSent.AI
description: TradeSent.AI is a real-time, automated trading system that utilizes a three-tier architecture to bridge the gap between financial news/social sentiment and trade execution, allowing retail users to trade based on market buzz with minimal latency.
